original: @20b # // h'um gi sa bon las skyes nas //
analyzed: @20b # // h'um gi sa bon las skyes nas //
translated: Born from the seed syllable hūṃ,

original: rnam par dag par bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag par bya ba'i bar du'o //

original: de nas nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa'i gshin rje mthar byed khro ba dang bcas pa skra gyen du 'greng pa /🔽zhal drug pa /
analyzed: de nas nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa'i gshin rje mthar byed khro ba dang bcas pa skra gyen du 'greng pa / zhal drug pa /
translated: Then, the syllable hūṃ located on the sun completely transforms into Yamāntaka, wrathful, with hair bristling upward,🔽with six faces,

original: zhabs drug pa ma he la zhon pa /
analyzed: zhabs drug pa ma he la zhon pa /
translated: six legs, mounted on a water buffalo,

original: g-yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa /
analyzed: g-yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa /
translated: standing with the left leg straight,

original: mi'i mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa /
analyzed: mi'i mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa /
translated: adorned with a garland of human heads,

original: shin tu 'jigs par byed pa'i rnam pa can /
analyzed: shin tu 'jigs par byed pa'i rnam pa can /
translated: with a form that is extremely terrifying,

original: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /🔽g-yas pa na ral gri dang / tho ba dang / rdo rje'o //
analyzed: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can / g-yas pa na ral gri dang / tho ba dang / rdo rje'o //
translated: with a tiger-skin skirt,🔽with a sword, a hammer, and a vajra in the right hands,

original: g-yon pa na dril bu dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / gtun shing bsnams pa /
analyzed: g-yon pa na dril bu dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / gtun shing bsnams pa /
translated: and with a bell, a vajra lasso, and a pestle in the left hands,

original: dbu rgyan mi bskyod pa'i rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: dbu rgyan mi bskyod pa'i rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: and with Akṣobhya as the crest ornament.

original: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Then, one should bind the pledge seal.

original: thal mo sbyar ba bcings te /
analyzed: thal mo sbyar ba bcings te /

original: mtheb chen gnyis kha phye ste sdigs mdzub gnyis kyang kha phye zhing gung mo gnyis tshigs gsum pa bcag par bya'o //
analyzed: mtheb chen gnyis kha phye ste sdigs mdzub gnyis kyang kha phye zhing gung mo gnyis tshigs gsum pa bcag par bya'o //
translated: The two thumbs are opened, and the two index fingers are also opened, and the two middle fingers are bent at the third joint.

original: aom hr'i:shtr'i:bi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i:shtr'i:bi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Om hrih shtambi vikritana na hum hum phat phat svaha.

original: zhes bya ba'i bzlas ba bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bzlas ba bya'o //

original: gshin rje nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so //
analyzed: gshin rje nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so //
translated: The sadhana of black Yamantaka is complete.

original: khams pa lo ts'a ba ba ri dge slong dharma k'irtis bsgyur ba'o /
analyzed: khams pa lo ts'a ba ba ri dge slong dharma k'irtis bsgyur ba'o /
translated: Translated by the translator from Kham, Bari Gelong Dharma Kirti.
